# CoverageSettings.WhatIf method

Provides simple validation support for the options; of necessity, it runs in the "before preparation" state.

```csharp
public ValidatedCommandLine WhatIf()
```

## Return Value

A validated command line containing any errors, or an empty one if all is ok
